resources.string: Please wait! We\'re sending your message to the support departmentâ€¦
Your message has been successfully delivered.
If you have any questions, issues or if you want to provide some suggestions, feel free to drop us a line!

"Well… This is embarrassing. It seems quickSMS is experiencing difficulties.

"
"If this is the first time you've been here consider restarting the app with the first button below.

"
"If you've been here before you may want to reset quickSMS with the second button, this will clear all of the data you've entered and fixes most problems.

"
"Finally if you're feeling generous you could send us a bug report to help us make quickSMS better

"

"Thank you for sending a bug report. The report will be sent by email to both of the quickSMS developers

"
"The email will contain the Model, Manufacturer and Android Version of your phone along with the error information provided by Android.

"
"You may use the text box below to provide additional information to help find the error, for example the sequence of actions you took immediately before triggering the error.

"
